text: Mechanical arbitrage bounds as you mentioned are very wide and you would indeed need huge deviances to put on these trades and hold to bet settlement. Statistical arbitrage bounds are much tighter and that's what you see keeps cross markets linked. Bet deviances can be transitory so you pay commission on pl realised to convergence time, not to settlement time.

elements.text: Mechanical arbitrage bounds as you mentioned are very wide and you would indeed need huge deviances to put on these trades and hold to bet settlement. Statistical arbitrage bounds are much tighter and that's what you see keeps cross markets linked. Bet deviances can be transitory so you pay commission on pl realised to convergence time, not to settlement time.

text: There is also the concept of choice or pick 'em markets. If you see a mechanical arb, that's also bid ask free chance to agress.

elements.text: There is also the concept of choice or pick 'em markets. If you see a mechanical arb, that's also bid ask free chance to agress.

text: <https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/choicemarket.asp>

attachments.title: What Is a Choice Market?
attachments.text: A choice market is a market in which the spread between the bid and the ask for a given financial instrument is zero.
attachments.fallback: Investopedia: What Is a Choice Market?

text: Ah ahn, thanks

elements.text: Ah ahn, thanks

text: cross market near-arbs or arbs can be seen as special case of choice markets. they give you option to agress on the side you like without incurring bid / ask spread. this can have beneficial impact on your strategy, both from trade entry and or exit. not a strategy in its own right but an execution optimization large scale strats should do

elements.text: cross market near-arbs or arbs can be seen as special case of choice markets. they give you option to agress on the side you like without incurring bid / ask spread. this can have beneficial impact on your strategy, both from trade entry and or exit. not a strategy in its own right but an execution optimization large scale strats should do
